title: Sony Xperia 1 review: a tall order
description: Sony's Xperia 1 Android phone is unique: it has a 21:9 aspect ratio on a 6.5-inch screen. It's tall, basically. But can Sony finally get over the problems it has historically had with cameras and software? And most importantly: can it really justify a $950 price?
